name: Out Of Sight (Piperipheral)
description:
My first ever finished and published game, made for Zenojam Game jam!

Assets Used: 

  • HALFTONE Sfx Pack Pro (https://void1gaming.itch.io/halftone-sound-effects-pack-pro)

Feedback is greatly appreciated!

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Move around
  • SPACE - Turn invisible to evade enemies
  • ESC - Quit

Meet Camo:
<-This guy

He has stumbled upon an adventure! Help him in his journey into the depths of the  mysterious dungeon where glowing portals take you deeper into the dungeon:


However, be wary of the various monsters that dwell within:

Sticky - just randomly moves about, enjoying life.

Peeper - likes staring at people. Claims to be able to see invisible things.

Fang - Brags about being able to fly above obstacles all the time.

Skull - Likes to chase moving things.

Camo is not completely defenseless, He can use his ability to turn invisible to avoid the enemies he encounters for a limited time. The dungeon has weird treasures that allows Camo to turn invisible for longer.
